description:
Partial demolition and refurbishment as two buildings across an east-west open courtyard, new roof extensions and conversion into 22 flats with a 22-space car park in existing lower ground floor, accessed via ramp next to main entrance on Dallington Street and creation of swimming pool building on vacant plot with gymnasium at rear. 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  117/P/02B,03B,04B,05B,07B,08B,                         09B,10B,11B
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of five years from the date of this permission. 

 REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
